Summary: From several miles away during daylight hours I observed a very large bright white square/rectangle (appeared pillow- or sheet-like) moving left to right in a slow straight path, then hover, close to the horizon.

divs: sighting detailson sunday may 13, 2012, a bright sunny and clear afternoon, while driving down a busy street, i noticed what appeared to be a very large object moving along the horizon several miles in front of me. the object was square\rectangular, bright white, and appeared almost pillow-like, or like a large sheet. it moved left to right in a straight path along the horizon at an unknown speed (as it was probably 5 miles away), but it appeared to move slowly. it also hovered several times, and possibly reversed it's direction. at the time i felt this was extremely strange and unlike anything i had ever seen before. my wife was with me and was puzzled by what we were seeing. i was forced to go with the flow of traffic and lost sight of the object after about 3-4 minutes.
